aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.secondText: I've been a <hightlight>software developer</hightlight> since 2018 and graduated from the <hightlight>University of Guadalajara</hightlight> with a degree in <hightlight>Computer Engineering</hightlight>
aboutMe.thirdText: I have more than three years of work experience using <hightlight>React</hightlight>, <hightlight>Tailwind</hightlight>, <hightlight>Node.js</hightlight> and <hightlight>TypeScript</hightlight>
aboutMe.fourthText: I also have experience using tools like <hightlight>Unity Engine</hightlight>, <hightlight>React Native</hightlight>, <hightlight>Git</hightlight>, <hightlight>MySQL</hightlight> and <hightlight>C#</hightlight>

myProjects.title: My projects
myProjects.hoverForPreview: Hover or press to watch a preview

xRayExplorerVR.description: VR application focused in learning about the human skeleton.

enLosOjosDeTlachy.description:
Puzzle and adventure videogame set in a isometric 2.5D world, in which you can play as a tlacuache that searches ways to avoid the challenges that their reality presents.

This game was submitted to a game jam organized by Latin America Games Showcase.

webpConverter.description:
Open source desktop multi-platform application that allows the user to convert images to .webp and other formats such as .jpg, .png, .tiff and .bmp.

At the moment has {{stars}} stars in GitHub!

proyectosYRefrigeracion.description: Official landing page for Refrigeración y Proyectos S.A. de C.V.

medalOfDarkness.description: Puzzle videogame for teenagers in order to help and improve the reading comprehension and logic reasoning.
